Description:
Key Responsibilities:Collaborate with the marketing team to understand project requirements and objectives for 3D design projects.
Create high-quality 3D models, animations, and visual assets for use in marketing materials, including social media, websites, presentations, and print collateral.
Develop 3D product renderings and visualizations to showcase products and concepts in a realistic and appealing manner.
Use software tools like Autodesk Maya, Cinema 4D, Blender, or other 3D modeling and animation software to bring creative ideas to life.
Design and execute 3D motion graphics and animations for videos, online ads, and interactive content.
Collaborate with the graphic design team to integrate 3D elements into 2D marketing materials seamlessly.
Ensure that all 3D designs are aligned with brand guidelines and consistently represent the brand's visual identity.Skills
Skills:
Bachelor's degree in Graphic Design, Animation, Multimedia, or a related field.
Proven experience (typically 2+ years) as a 3D Designer, preferably in a marketing or advertising setting.
Proficiency in 3D modeling, texturing, and rendering using software such as Autodesk Maya, Cinema 4D, Blender, or similar tools.
Strong skills in 3D animation and motion graphics, creating visually appealing and dynamic content.
Knowledge of lighting, shading, and visual effects to create realistic and visually stunning 3D visuals.
Familiarity with Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, After Effects) for post-production work.
Ability to conceptualize and execute creative ideas into compelling 3D designs.
Strong attention to detail and the ability to maintain quality and consistency in all 3D assets.
Effective communication skills to collaborate with cross-functional teams and present design concepts.
